about_html: Bartender'sTrivia is a trivia-style game where you can choose from various categories, both created by me and contributed by others. The code for this project is licensed under the GNU/GPL, version 3 or later. This version has been modified for educational purposes, focusing on the world of mixology, including official recipes, historical facts, interesting data, events, and more related to bartending. Source Code Bartender'sTrivia Â© 2024 - 2025 Robin M. Ober @robinn4k.
game_over: You got {total_correct} question(s) right and {total_failed} wrong.
no_records: There are no saved scores yet
only_in_lang: Show only trivia in the selected language
